Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text:
Incredibly slow serving. We waited at least 30 minutes to get the waiter attention (despite asking multiple times) and another 30 minutes to get the food. The food is good but the servings are small for the price.
Wouldn't recommend.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Food was overpriced and the worst service l‚Äôve ever seen in my life. We ordered our food and it took more than half an hour for it to come (when it came), because some items were missing. My friend had to eat the leftovers from our plates ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Worst service, took over 30m for a coffee juice and bagel. Also bagel was terrible, had completely fallen apart and the cream cheese was all over the plate when setved

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: The bagels are very tasty (especially with cream cheese) and the service very nice and friendly.. I would definitly recommend to have your breakfast here (especially to guests of the nearby student hotel, like we have been)

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text:
Nice, cozy bagels place.
With a lot of healthy stuff.
Vegetarian, vegan options available.
Jungle juice - one love üíö

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Delicious bagels and coffee!

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Really delicious, warm bagels. The specialty cream cheeses were incredibly good, especially the pesto and sun-dried tomatoes one. And the coffee was excellent as well. Have come to Bagels & Beans multiple times this week and will definitely be coming back if I visit Amsterdam again in the future.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Bagels & Beans: always good quality, variety of choices and friendly staff. You don't even get time to make a picture of your favourite bagel!!

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Great food and excellent service, well worth a visit if ur local

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Favorite place to eat!! It became almost a must in my visit to Amsterdam. Fast and efficient, welcoming service. They remembered my likes after few times there and pitched in very good suggestions. The food was super yummy, never thought there were such variety of bagels! :) Thanks and keep it up!!

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: I will never give a B&B a bad rating lol so tasty üòã

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Love bagels here as well as coffee. Perfect plase to relax and eat well. Plenty of space to sit and enjoy.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Food is very nice and the atmosphere is chill. This particular branch was a bit off the beaten path so it was like a little neighbourhood spot for the locals to have breakfast. I really enjoyed it.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: a great place with fresh tasty bagels and tapanads, low prices.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: I really enjoyed my experience at bagels and beans good service and overall good food. I liked the juice that I had there and I loved the tuna melt that I had and I look forward to eating there again.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Great and tasty. Good price!

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Very friendly staff and a good menu full of what you can expect of Bagels & Beans. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Loved the bagels!! Totally recommend the goats cheese, walnut and honey salad üëåüèº

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text:
Had a lot of waiting (1h20).
Even if we were the only one in the restaurant. 12people arriving after us got served before. Then a LOT of mistakes in the order. The boss was there but he ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: We waited one hour for two bagels.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Amazing Bagels, nice staff. Several (three?) Vegan options! Avocado, Tomato cream cheese, no-meat hot bagel.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Lovely! Food was delicious, all freshly baked bagels and fresh ingredients, hot chocolate was to die for, service was very friendly. Atmosphere was great, a nice bustle of people coming through on a nice corner by Wibautstraat. Became our regular breakfast spot for the second half of our trip!

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: The bagels are delicious, but when you're sitting at a 2 person table, the table is way too small. Two drinks and two bagels and there's no room left to even put your cutlery next to your plate. Also the chairs are horrible for your back. So it's in and out for the bagels.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: I go to B&B every time I am in Amsterdam. I love their bagel options, the coffee is proper, the staff is very helpful and can make your day brighter. A good place for breakfast.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: If you like bagels, this is the place for you. Different types of bagels on the menu

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Great place for a quick lunch or breakfast! Offers a large selection of bagels. Good coffee and friendly service!

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Best bagels ever. And the orangejuice is awsome!!

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: A Bagel-restaurant you can find more often in Amsterdam. You get different kind of Bagels, you choose what you wantto put on it, and so you‚Äòll get your very own customized Bagel in the end! üôÇ

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: My boyfriend and i were there 2 days ago. We order special sandwiches with extra avocados. They gave us 2 small slides of avocado and charged for that 1 euro each. The current supermarket price for an avocado is 0.90 euro. I asked them if ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Coffee was okay, but nothing special. Smoked salmon bagel was overpriced for the amount of food you got. Muffins were the same as you'd get in any chain brand caf√©. Very friendly staff.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text:
Really good bagels and cozy place!
I had the vegetarian, but was very tempted to try the insect bagel.
Only thing missing in this place is toilet facilities.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Love the quality of the bagels and the smoothie selection. Had the Matcha latte and smoked salmon bagel out on the terrace. Would recommend for brunch

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Super friendly staff, delicious food, and warm drinks- what more can you ask for! I'll definitely be back next time I get that bagel craving

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: A fantastic place for brunch with friends. Loved the sesame bagel with goat cheese, walnut and honey. Will go there again next time I'm in Amsterdam.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: The best iced coffee I've ever had! Nice surroundings, plenty of seating, tasty bagels with lots of choice.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Pretty good bagels! Maybe a bit expensive but I think they are worth it. I also got a free sample of a smoothie while waiting, which is nice!

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Great set up. Very simple menu but also quite accommodating to a variety of tastes. Lovely atmosphere and well priced for what you get.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Those bagels are amazing and just perfect for our late breakfast. Great way to start the day! Good coffee as well. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Best bagel branch with vegan bagels aaand creamcheese!

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Bagels are as big and fulfilling as burgers. However, they are way too expensive.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: The staff are awesome and you have to try the toasted bagel with cream cheese they are an epic way to start the day. They often give out small juice samples while you are waiting

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Amazing coffee concoctions and a variety of bagels. Ideal place for breakfast, with an atmosphere to get some work done in peace

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Friendly staff, the food was good, the prices were reasonable and service was quick. Not tons of vegan options, but enough to still make it a good meal for the two of us dining there

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Ate at a bunch of bagels and beans over amsterdam but this one tops them all. Thanks to the (allmost former) owners. Hope nothing changes when it changes ownership in 2 days...

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Excellent healthy choice of foods served with a smile!

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: In my opinion some of the best coffees in Amsterdam. The staff is really nice and professional and the place is really nice to sit down, relax, and even work.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Excellent Customer Service! Friendly& warm,....  I love their cappuccino's & bagels with hummus! + good working WIFI!

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Quiet little coffeeshop with delicious bagels; quick, friendly service; and great coffee.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Great bagels and friendly staff.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Delicious bagels, so many variations to chose from! Very friendly staff and excellent coffee.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Nice place for a quick lunch ! I enjoyed the smoothie and bagel.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Absolutely no knowledge about coffee. And when you try sincerely to tell them the difference between a latte and late macchiato they even won't listen.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Best bagels & beans in town. Friendly people, good menu, coffee on point every time.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: All the bagel goodness you need! Really tasty and nice staff

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Best Gluten free Bagel ever. A must on any trip to Amsterdam.

Name: Bagels and Beans
Review Text: Quick stop for a takeaway coffee one morning. Faultless service and staff. Coffee excellent too.

Review Text: Great place with very friendly staff and tasty bagels. I strongly recommend this place :)
